sentence: Thats what could happen in Pennsylvania, where state Sen. Doug Mastriano and Kathy Barnette could capture the partys nods for governor and U.S. senator, respectively.
author: Henry Olsen
title: Opinion Republicans have only themselves to blame for unelectable big lie candidates

sentence: Not when people like Pennsylvania State Senator Doug Mastriano an election denier who marched with the Jan. 6 crowd at the Capitol just won the G.O.P.
title: My Lunch With President Biden
